• Join our 30,000 everyday heroes.

• LLM Systems: Experience working with LLMs in production, including prompt/tool design, latency and cost optimization, and safety/guardrails.
• Developer Experience: Track record improving developer workflows and productivity through internal tooling, automation, and clear documentation.
